column3: It is you! The one who fought alongside Lord Hien and won Doma her freedom! It is an honor to receive you, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>!
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Mistress<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>! You honor us with your presence!
What kind of place is this?
My name is Yomogi, and as for what I do... Well, when our family still had our stall, I helped my parents sell dango. But those days are gone...

The markets once rivaled those of Kugane. You could buy anything─even Hannish spices! It will take many years of hard work before it even begins to approach its former glory, but we will do what we must.
The enclave was once a center of culture and commerce. Merchants and artisans from all across Yanxia came here to live and work...but that all ended a year ago.
After crushing the rebellion, Zenos made an example of the enclave...and we who survived were forced to live in the ruins...
Monzen suffered a similar fate...though unlike the enclave, none were allowed to remain.
But those dark days are finally behind us! Now that our homeland has been freed from Garlean rule, we can begin rebuilding in earnest! Is it not wonderful?
